item.title: eBus - TTL
item.description: layout: page hide_title: true hide: true About This adapter is designed to connect an eBus compatible boiler to any TTL port (TTL-USB, ESP8266, ESP32, Arduino, etc). Same size as popular RS485-TTL module for more compatibility. As a software part, you can use ebusd with different connection types: TTL-UART - you need converter that doesn’t buffer too much data (CP2102 or FTDI based (like FT232)) üëç ESP8266 / ESP32 enhanced ebusd protocol using ebusd-esp firmware (only Wi-Fi connection now) üéâ Raspberry Pi internal UART port can be used with some preparations,
